Hubot-skype-web » Index » SkypeWebAdapter

Class: SkypeWebAdapter

Defined in: src\skypeweb.coffee
Inherits: Adapter

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) run() Starts the adapter
  • # (void) send(envelope, strings...) Entry point for messages from hubot
  • # (void) reply(envelope, strings...) Replies back to a specific user.
  • # (void) login(options = {}) Private Login to Skype web client and retrieve a sample poll request.
  • # (void) copyRequest(request) Private Stores details of the intercepted request for later use.
  • # (void) onEventMessage(msg) Private Handles all Skype events coming from the server
  • # (void) sendInQueue(user, msg) Private Store skype message to be send in queues
  • # (void) sendRequest(user, msg) Private Sends POST request to skype containing new message to given user
  • # (void) pollRequest() Private Polls the server for new events.

Constructor Details

# (void) constructor(robot)

Parameters:

  • robot ( Robot ) — the instance of hubot that uses the adapter

Instance Method Details

# (void) run()

Starts the adapter

# (void) send(envelope, strings...)

Entry point for messages from hubot

# (void) reply(envelope, strings...)

Note: it prefixes messages only in group chats

Replies back to a specific user.

# (void) login(options = {}) Private

Note: Uses PhantomJS to render the web page and monitor network traffic

Login to Skype web client and retrieve a sample poll request.

Options Hash: (options):

  • success ( Function ) — executed if the correct requests are found
  • error ( Function ) — executed if the time exceeds the limit

# (void) copyRequest(request) Private

Note: Most importantly it obtains the RegistrationToken which is used to authenticate the requests for receiving or sending messages

Stores details of the intercepted request for later use.

Parameters:

  • request ( Request ) — the poll request made from skype web client

# (void) onEventMessage(msg) Private

Handles all Skype events coming from the server

Parameters:

  • msg ( EventMessage ) — the event object

# (void) sendInQueue(user, msg) Private

Note: This prevents newer messages from being received prior to older ones due to the async nature of the requests being made

Store skype message to be send in queues

Parameters:

  • user ( String ) — the recipient of the message
  • msg ( String ) — the contents of the message to be send

# (void) sendRequest(user, msg) Private

Note: it recursively calls itself until queues are empty

Sends POST request to skype containing new message to given user

Parameters:

  • user ( String ) — the recipient of the message
  • msg ( String ) — the contents of the message to be send

# (void) pollRequest() Private

Note: it recursively calls itself

Polls the server for new events.
